DOC.brief_summary: Phenylephrine hydrochloride ophthalmic solution alpha-1 adrenergic receptor agonist commonly use topically dilation prior ocular fundus examination . In eye , phenylephrine act locally potent vasoconstrictor mydriatic constrict ophthalmic blood vessel radial dilator muscle iris . Episcleral venous pressure ( EVP ) determinant intraocular pressure ( IOP ) measure non-invasively venomanometry . Since phenylephrine vasoconstrictor , may affect episcleral venous tone , effect EVP unknown . Understanding physiology episcleral vein help u well understand pathophysiology glaucoma .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Topical Phenylephrine 2.5 % EVP Normal Human Eyes
DOC.criteria: Any selfdeclared ethnoracial category . Medically healthy subject . Subjects two healthy eye . Intraocular pressure ( IOP ) less 22 mmHg eye . Bestcorrected visual acuity ( BCVA ) eye 20/50 better . Open angle eye . Contact lens wear stop least 3 day prior study , study . Ability cooperate examination require study . Chronic acute ophthalmic disease include glaucoma , wet type macular degeneration , uveitis clinically significant cataract . Evidence ocular infection , inflammation , clinically significant blepharitis conjunctivitis . Cornea pathologic change prevent reliable measurement . Narrow anterior chamber angle . Previous intraocular surgery , laser procedure , intravitreal injection . Previous corneal refractive surgery . Myopia great 6.00 D spherical equivalent . Hyperopia great +2.00 D spherical equivalent . Lack suitable episcleral vein measurement . Ocular trauma within past 6 month . Ocular infection ocular inflammation past 3 month . Ocular medication kind within 30 day study visit . Known hypersensitivity Phenylephrine topical anesthetic medication . Severe hypertension : Systolic blood pressure great 180 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure great 105 mmHg . A known history ischemic heart disease ( angina myocardial infarction ) , cerebrovascular accident , cardiac arrhythmia , cerebral aortic aneurysm . Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus . Uncontrolled hyperthyroidism . Use systemic medication within 30 day prior study include : βadrenergic antagonist , αadrenergic agonist antagonist , calcium channel blocker , diuretic , vasodilator , monoamine oxidase inhibitor , systemic steroid . Participation interventional study within past 30 day prior study visit . Women pregnant .
